items.question: Is the WOF check really free?
items.answer: Yes, the free WOF check is included with any Pit Stop Ezy service, which starts from $124.00 for EV service and $199.00 for petrol or diesel vehicle, during the promotional period. Click here to see our full range of Ezy Services.

items.question: When does this offer end?
items.answer: This is a limited time offer. Please contact your nearest Pit Stop location for specific end dates.

items.question: How do I book the service and free WOF?
items.answer: You can book your service using the form below, or find your nearest Pit Stop location to book directly.

items.question: Can I book now for a later date?
items.answer: Yes, you can book in advance for a date that suits you. Simply select your preferred date when booking.

items.question: Where is my nearest Pit Stop?
items.answer: Use our store locator to find the Pit Stop location nearest to you.
